text:
Rob Kardashian shares adorable video of Dream shouting ‘dada’ from her cot (Picture: Rob Kardashian)

Rob Kardashian has taken to SnapChat to share an adorable video of his daughter Dream, shouting ‘dada’ from her cot.

The one-year-old can be seen poking her head above the bars of her crib calling for her ‘dada’ who is presumably filming the clip.

She looks so precious in her baby pink onsie with her curly hair framing her chubby little cheeks.

Proclaiming her love for her dad, and trying to get some attention, the little one was surrounded by a number of toys including a elephant rocker, Peppa Pig and a mini piano.

The 30-year-old sock designer and his now ex-fiancee Blac Chyna welcomed their bundle of joy into the world last year.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

She was born 10 November, just 11 months after her parents had started dating.

Rob proposed to the model in April 2016 with a $325,000 (£231,680) ring, but despite this, they remained on and off and split in February last year.

Blac Chyna is currently in the middle of a legal battle with Kim Kardashian following the cancellation of her reality show Rob & Chyna.

Kim, Rob and Kris Jenner hit back at Chyna after she claimed they had defamed her and sabotaged her show.

However, the defendants in the suit say Chyna’s claims are ‘bald conclusions that have no factual support.’
